general.headline: Solutions Architect, Software Architect and developer
general.school: Sikkim Manipal University of Health, Medical and Technological Sciences
general.description:
Solutions designer, Developer and Solutions Architect with over 15 years of Experience. He has extensive experience in Microsoft .NET environment and some experience in J2EE environment. He has involved in a multitude of projects with a myriad of business domains.
Buddhima has extensive experience in defining IT solutions based on customer requirements. He has involved in the full development life cycle and lead System Designers, Tech Leads, Team Leads, BI Engineers, DBAs, Developers, System Engineers and QC to make sure the business requirements are delivered.
Always liaise with team and project managers to rectify issues and make sure the project is on track.
He has involved in setting up development teams with responsibilities, processes, guidelines and standards. Also involved in proposing and setting up required IT Infrastructure for teams.

Highlights: Solution analysis, Defining system architecture, Object Oriented Analysis and Design (OOAD), Agile software development, SCRUM, align teams with architecture and best practices ALM, Continuous integration, Cloud Architecture, Microservices Architecture, DevOps, Azure, Service Fabric, Kubernetes

general.headline: Chief Software Architect at hSenid | AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
general.description:
I have over 15 years of experience in IT Industry and currently working for hSenid Business Solutions as a software architect.
 
I am an expert in .net technologies including asp.net, C#,VB.net ,  web service and MVC in Visual Studio 2003 - 2013. Also I have worked as an architect under LAMP stack with PHP, Apache, MySQL, Symfony framework, Bird and open DS. I have years of experience in RDBMS in various DB platforms including MSSQL server 2000 - 2016, Orcale 9i - 12c, DB2, AS400 and MySQL.
 
I have high performed employment history including best employee, best Individual outstanding performance awards several times in carrier.

I have completed MSc. In computer science (2009 -Specialised in Software Architect) from Faculty of Engineering, University of Moratuwa and B.Sc. in Engineering (2003- Specialized in Computer Engineering) from faculty of engineering, University of Peradeniya.

I was a member of the hSenid business solutions senior management team since 2009.

projects.description:
{"description": "Employee Life Cycle Management Module for eHRM enterprise
Sep 2014 – Present

Project descriptionAn employee faces certain movement(s) in his/her tenure in an organization. Employee movements (events) should be carefully identified and controlled at the correct time. The most common types of employee movements can be identified as. Promotions, Changing designations, Transfers, Salary increments, Rewarding, etc. 
Employee Life Cycle (ELC) module, a significant module in the HRM enterprise suite, facilitates process employee movements in an efficient way. 

Technologies : C#.net 4.5 , MVC4 , Knockoutjs , jQuery , TFS , Visual Studio 2013
Other creators
Weligamage Priyantha Pushpakumara Asitha Goonewardena MCIM(UK) Hashan Peiris
Project namePeoplesHR Mobile (Apple iOS)
Jan 2013 – Present

Project descriptionCloud based HR Mobile solution that empowers your workforce. With PeoplesHR Mobile you can easily manage your HR via a comprehensive and a user-friendly interface from any place in the world.

PeoplesHR Mobile is a complete cloud based HR software solution covering a wide spectrum of your HR needs such as Absence management, Training and development or Performance management etc. It will bridge the gap between employee and employer by providing speedy access to the HR system via smart mobile devices. With Peoples HR Mobile, your staff will have the tool they need to perform a wide range of HR activities at their fingertips.

Other creators
Sachi Wickramage Asitha Goonewardena MCIM(UK)
See project PeoplesHR Mobile (Apple iOS)See project
Project nameHRM Enterprise Absence Management Module
Feb 2010 – Present

Project descriptionDevelopment of One of a Key Module runs in HRM Enterprise Suite. 

This module has several components such as Web Application, Kiosk Application, Mobile Application, API layer etc... 

Once an employee submits a leave application, it will go through an approval workflow before he/she is granted the leave. Such a system can ease the lives of both the leave applying and the approval parties namely the subordinates and the supervisors.

Absence Management can be performed accurately as employees’ leave is recorded systematically for long time periods. Employer and the employee can anytime access the system to find the leave specific details.

Absence Management Module, a significant module of the HRM Enterprise suite, covers the entire life cycle of the leave applying, approval and management process. 

The significance of this module is it suits any size of organization from 50 employees to over 25000 employees , for any industry area, for any country without doing any changes at source code. 

Currently this same module runs in Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Sri Lanka, India, Kenya, Dubai, Tanzania, South Africa and 30 countries.... 

Other creators
Wajira Somarathne Niroshana Chandrasekara Chamila Liyanage
Project nameTransformation of Sri Lanka's Largest Apparel manufacturer's operational HR
Feb 2013 – Dec 2015

Project descriptionThe Organization is geographically dispersed across 38 locations in Sri Lanka, India and Bangladesh. Due to its expansion through merges and acquisitions during the time, each of these factories had their independent and incongruent HR operations and processes running on siloed systems of hSenid HRMenterprise, which led to adopting inherent home grown practices. The challenge was to get a consolidated view of HR operations and KPIs. 
In addition, the lack of a standard solution throughout the organisation led to audit issues, compliance violations and fraud. Thus, the objective was to streamline processes, standardise the key HR functions across the entire group and have a single centralized solution with embedded industry best practices which would provide the ability to receive consolidated information from across the group which enables better control over all factories within the group for strategic decision making. 
Other creators
Afham Mohamed Ali Sampath Gunawardena Sanath Wickremasinghe, PMP, CSM Noel Arokiam Yuwanmini Landersz Thilanchana Bandaranayake Nuwan Lorensuhewa 8+
Project nameeSamurdhi HRM
Apr 2011

Project descriptioneSamurdhi online is an award winning complex Information System which involved an integration of the Symfony framework and a customized HR management solution with the Web based HRM solution. The data integration part was done using OpenDS and single sign on (SSO) implemented using Ldap and Cas integration.
.
This integration had immense national importance for this key public sector authority of the government of Sri Lanka and it currently has over 27,000 users using the centralised web payroll/HRM with multilingual support. 

Technologies Used: php5/symphony framework, nusoap Web Services, Mysql, Open Ds Ldap, Cas integration, , JQuery, Javascript, HTML, XHTML, XML

Project nameGNTracker – IoT Device
Apr 2016

Project descriptionThe GnTracker device was in-house developed as a remote tracking solution to better enhance the service delivery of Laugfs International, the authorized agent for Yamaha and Airman generators. The service calls for generators are usually triggered by the customer, after which the maintenance team at Laugfs International respond with the necessary services, as is the practice with most after-sales service providers in Sri Lanka. The pioneering GnTracker device now allows the maintenance teams to remotely monitor and track generator performance and proactively trigger service calls, transforming the customer experience. As an effective and scalable solution, the GNTracker is the first of its kind to be developed in Sri Lanka and is faceted with features that make it an ideal solution, not just for Laugfs International, but for other organisations and industries. The GnTracker unit can be attached not only to Generators, but to any equipment, which requires triggered alerts and other important information related to the device’s operation. As a result, this new product solution can be applied in many different industries, irrespective of the product or brand, making it a highly scalable product.

Key Responsibilities : 
- Architect / Design & develop the IoT Device and Firmware to communicate with cloud
- Architect / Design & develop the Back end web application to monitor the IoT device data

Technologies :
- Arduino
- .Net / C# / MVC / Azure / Azure Web SQL
Other creators
Indika Gunawardena Gayan Ranasinghe

Telecommunication system configuration and monitoring dashboard
Mar 2014 – Nov 2014

Project descriptionApplication is a web based solution based on AngularJS and SpringMVC to provide network administrators and super-users a tool to configure, manage and monitor all parts of a telecommunication system through a rich dashboard.

Configuration includes 
- Configuring Alarm Settings.
- Configuring Time Division Multiplexing Cards. 
- Configuring Probe Boards.

Monitoring Includes
- Monitoring System Health
- Monitoring Process information

Enterprises can vastly benefit from MATRIX24x7 to manage its computing equipment through capabilities such as real time monitoring, publishing and routing alerts on failures, among many other offered features.

Project nameMobile POS Device Configuration Application
Apr 2013

Project descriptionThe purpose of this project is to implement an insightful Black Widow POS configuration utility for iOS & Android platforms. The primary goal of the initial phase is to provide a mechanism to configure the Black Widow’s configuration parameters and provide guidance to the users on the supporting functions. The configuration application will resemble common wizard-based utilities employed by many wireless peripherals that rely upon a wired connection for the initial wireless configuration.

Project nameProject Third Eye - Mixed Reality (Augmented/Virtual) Framework
Apr 2011

Project description“Project Third-Eye” introduces a novel framework which allows developers to combine advanced 3D graphics and
augmented reality to their applications with a minimum learning curve. Also features a new way of
Human computer interaction and virtual shopping by use of hand gestures and augmented reality.
is a system built by the use of mixed reality. Main objective of “Project Third-Eye” is to increase the overall human computer interaction using hand gestures. The system consists of three main components. A backend framework, a Sub-OS built on top of the framework, and an applications layer. The framework combines several computer vision libraries to creates a more high level and easier to use environment for developers. The framework is the bottom-most layer of all the applications running on the “Project Third-Eye” Framework and is responsible for interacting with hardware devices. It is also developed to encourage other developers to portray their own innovative ideas using this framework. 

Project “Third-Eye” will allow users to interact with the computer using hand gestures, perform various activities such as video viewing and picture viewing. Apart from that, using the two applications that will be built on the application layer, users can create 3D architectural designs in a virtual/augmented environment, and by using the Try-before-you-buy application users can try-out clothes, accessories before buying them virtually, by accessing online stores.

Responsibilities

- Involved in designing the framework architecture, implementation of hand gesture recognition.
- Involved in all of the 3D modelling and animation of the project.

Other creator
Roshan Gamage

Aug 2010

Project descriptionTenure : Curtin University System design & programming project (2010)

Technologies Involved : C#, .NET Remoting, ASP.NET, Web services (SOAP), AJAX

The application solves a problem of recovering a password using distributed brute forcing. The application
is designed in a multi-tiered distributed architecture, focusing on load balancing and dynamic scalability.

communicate with their customers. The system includes a queue of sales agents and each agent is allocated a customer according to the order of the queue. Call cost, report generation is handled through the system.

account control.
